page.title: 071905 - Recollections
page.content: I interviewed a 92 year old man.He said he remembered when he was at school with clean black boots and girls with clean starched pinafores.He had a whiptop,a small wooden top with an iron spike in the spinning end.They did not have any homework from school but plenty at home like cleaning shoes for the next day and folding up clothes.He moved to Stratford and did not have so far to walk to school,but as they were getting older the lessons were getting harder.He could get a hair cut for one shilling.Then he moved to Warwick School,and if he did not have homework,he was kept busy with weeding or hoeing at home.
